content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the response that the writer of the e-mail is most likely expecting from the recipient?

choices.label: The writer has no idea whether or not the recipient will agree.
The writer is fairly confident that the recipient will agree.
The writer feels that the recipient is unlikely to agree.
The writer hopes to change the mind of the recipient, who has already disagreed.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
